attributes.action: Call a Referendum on the future of the House of Lords.
attributes.background: The House of Lords is a totally un-elected body which has a very large amount of power in the UK. It is unaccountable for it's actions and therefore is deeply undemocratic. The taxpayers who fund this institution should be able to decide it's future, whether to replace, keep or abolish it.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105187

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
